meanings.definition: The quality or state of being luxurious.
meanings.sent1: The luxuriousnesses of the hotel's spa made me feel like royalty.
meanings.sent2: She loved the luxuriousnesses of the silk sheets on her bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat's luxuriousnesses in demanding only the finest tuna was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The luxuriousnesses of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The luxuriousnesses of the feast left everyone feeling content and pampered.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being extravagant or indulgent in comfort and pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The luxuriousnesses of the cruise ship's amenities were beyond compare.
meanings.sent2: They indulged in the luxuriousnesses of a five-star meal at the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent3: His luxuriousnesses in always having the latest gadgets was quite amusing to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The luxuriousnesses of her laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The luxuriousnesses of the garden transported visitors to a paradise of beauty.
